Review.Contenu: So far the application seems promising and I have not been able to complete it due minor incompatibilities and pricing plan limitations. The trainings have been amazing, I am definitely closer from launching than when I started.It is hard to get a one on one call. Perhaps we could get more info about how.

Review.Titre: Love the training however the access keeps crashing
Review.Contenu: Love the training and looking forward to learning how to build the app.  However, the support has been hit and miss.  I have had continual problems with getting access to the training.  I view a couple of days and it is fine and then when I'm really raring to go to the next training, I'm locked out.  Support does fix it, but I keep losing time waiting.

Review.Titre: I had a difficult time navigating…
Review.Contenu: I had a very difficult time navigating the homepage. Some of the videos did not work properly.Once I finally figured out where I was supposed to go it got a bit better.But I am still not clear on how to make the App. I had a service call with a gentleman named Marck and he tried to explain the steps but it was a bit overwhelming.

Review.Titre: Looking good so far...
Review.Contenu: I love the concept, process, and unique ability to create an APP my way.  Passion.io course and app has the chops and the content but the company appears to still be working on the details of their success. I do recommend it but gave it 3 stars as there have been some kinks in the process.  Feels like a beta program in ways. I will stick with it because it is soooo worth it.

Review.Titre: To be honest I am still struggling
Review.Contenu: To be honest I am still struggling. I am so overwhelmed!So much new information and I just do not know where to start. I started the 30-day challenge and got to day 11 and sort of went on to day 12 but I am so stuck.I did reach out to the Passion.io gurus. I had a one-on-one with Georgie and she was very patient with me. But since I don't know what I don't know...I really had a hard time asking her questions. I have also reached out to other Pasisonfighters and trying to work through the process with them also.I think my next step is to start the 30-day challenge over again and see if I can push through better the second time.

Review.Titre: Not without problems.  Great customer service
Review.Contenu: I’m laughing at a review down below.  It says if you can’t get this app up and running its on you and you must be an idiot.  Well, you are reading a review from a genuine idiot I guess, lol.  First off, the customer support from passion is second to none, and I can’t sing their praises enough. I should know, they must know me personally by now.  Building the app was fun and easy and the step by step instructions excellent.  Getting it published on google play store was challenging and I struggled through the instructions.  Naively, I thought I would just press a button!  It was a two day process taking all of my brain power. Publishing to apple was a nightmare.  It has been a two month endeavor.  They rejected us six times.  But that was issues with passion, not me.  Apple doesn’t  like how the app is made.  Finally, they accepted the seventh application.  To passion’s credit, they just kept fixing things and plugging away.  We started this process back in November’21 and it is now nearing the end of April ‘22.  And we are on apple!  But the app is so full of bugs and glitches, it doesn’t work and we cannot offer it to our clients.  The web app works great though.  I have no doubt that passion will help us through with these bugs.  But keep in mind that it’s a six month process.  Of note, the app on the google play store, after one fix from passion,  has worked  well.  But most people like apple it seems, so we still don’t have a working app.

Review.Titre: A little glimmer of passion directed my way for a moment.
Review.Contenu: Editing my review since I did get an email from Jessie at  Passion io who worked with me briefly to get my account back on track. He has gone missing in the last few days though, which seems a bit odd...Since he promised to give me a set up call, then missed my meeting because of the time zone mix up. It has been a few weeks now and I am still waiting to talk with someone...About me, Yes I am a passionate person indeed. And I have always wanted an App for my glamorous California based business. I am not really a complainer but this has been a situation that troubled me since it is really important to me. I want to expand my business and I felt this would help me do that worldwide.So when I saw Dan's webinar I signed up right away. I did it because it sounded so amazing and so easy to set up. Well this is not the case for me so far. I am not an expert in technology by any means, but have taken time over the years to learn about setting up my website, doing email blasts and social media. After the webinar, I felt like I could learn to set up this app since Dan did include training in the subscription. What makes me really concerned and a bit hopeless, is that I recently watched the video that explains how to set up the Google Play app. After seeing it I realized this particular process will be over my head. I do think you need to get outside help with the Passion io app setup process. I do not think Passion io will help me either. Another thing, Dan instructed us to ask questions in the Facebook group. He said that it was filled with very helpful engaged Passion Fighters there to help each other succeed. So I decided to ask a question and promptly got an answer. The thing was that the person that answered me directed me to his website to order his program for $49 dollars to help me figure out how to use Passion io! :) I mean he did answer my question that was nice. He was polite but that was not what I expected from the Facebook group. I actually hoped that Dan would answer me!Another really big thing is the amount of time it takes to hear back from the Passion io customer service. The marketing that Dan does seems to focus on those of us with businesses in the US.  The thing is that when you ask a question, it takes a very long time to get a reply. And when you reply back with a second question it does not get answered. This is frustrating and probably the key to why I got so annoyed in the first place. They seem to be super busy helping someone else! So that means to me that MY app is really not a priority to anyone at all except me! I just want to be honest with my experience thus far. Here is an analogy, I have been in retail for years.And I know how to treat my customers well. If they are unhappy they tell you to your face. This is the problem with trying to do your work online to a faceless support team.They do not have to show up if they do not want to. How do you feel when you go into a store with a salesperson that is standing there and does not offer to help you? Any normal person gets offended or feels rejected. So this is the case with me and Passion io. I have actually invested in the app and am still getting ignored by the salesperson! A suggestion would be to set up a group of people on the Passion io customer service based here in the US. It would be better for me that's for sure and then I could finish my app very quickly. Or perhaps, they could communicate with us US customers with the best or at least an approximate time window as to when I/we can ask a question or two based in my/our time zone. Instead of randomly contacting them at any time of day to ask questions. Just tell me/us when is the best time to communicate. We are all in business this is acceptable. I think my biggest problem here is that I am going to spend a lot of time working on this app and not understanding what to do to finish it. And then it will never get done. More time and money lost. More regrets. Wish me luck!

Review.Titre: I saw the PASSION.IO ad on Instagram…
Review.Contenu: I have received a full refund. Thank you PASSION.IO.As payment for my first review, PASSION.IO paid me in kind with a book. I have cancelled my access to that book, returning it to PASSION.IO. I have rescinded my original 5-star review in order to comply with Trust Pilot terms and conditions, now giving here my most honest, balanced, and unpaid review. I have received a full refund from PASSION.IO.If one reads the best of best case studies, one may decide that for a certain percentage of students, PASSION.IO provides value.  It is often the case that the top 5% of a group will have success. So if PASSION.IO features that top 5%, they should not be discounted for that fact.It may be that the Day 1 reviews on Trust Pilot are not fake reviews. One must go with one's conscience whether an excited Day 1 student can give a full impression of the results they will get by the end of their journey. The results come when a person applies effort. It follows that it is difficult to judge the value of the entire journey by the excitement on Day 1.Here is what happened to me:On Day 1, Lesson 1, at the time I entered the course, as a new student I was promised a payment in kind of a special book if I gave a review to Trust Pilot and screen-shot the review and emailed the screenshot as proof to PASSION.IO. Part of the Day 1 assignment was to follow a link provided by PASSION.IO with instructions on how to go into Trust Pilot, create a Trust Pilot account and rate the course.  Since all the other reviews flooding Trust Pilot are also Day1 or first week reviews, excited, it may be because people want to be paid in kind with the special book, and are leaving rave reviews before they test whether they will get the promised results from the course. Each student will have to decide for themselves whether they are leaving an honest unpaid review. On Day 2 I met real students who did not show, after one year, the evidence of the 30-day results promised in the sales promotions. On Day 3, I found that I had been charged $1200.00 for an add-on IMPACT ACCELERATOR course advertised with two options: $79 or $239.  My credit card fraud and dispute department agreed that it would be wise to cancel and request full refund of all charges.On Day 3, after realizing how much I trusted PASSION.IO, and wondering whether I had been taken advantage of, I took a hard look at the promotions versus results I'd observed among real students, and began to think through long term whether all student business and intellectual property are slaved to this website. Can a student transport their app to a different service provider? Or does the code belong to PASSION.IO? Dan, an owner, addresses this question, below. Thank you Dan.PASSION.IO does not appear, as of today, to have any negative reviews online. I understand from some postings on the student chats that the company has recently revamped their website and processes and has called to old students who had abandoned the course, to return to the course. I do not know the former name of this business.Despite over-charging me, and despite my observations that there is a tendency for over-promising on the promotional promises, yet there are two signals that the owners are sincere (1) they are indeed passionate in their videos and continuously encouraging to students, and (2) because they have refunded me without any resistance. These are two signs the owners are invested in keeping and growing their business. Good signs. Thank you Dan and thank you Trust Pilot.

Review.Titre: Excellent process
Review.Contenu: Excellent process. It really sells well, arguments are impecable and they really help you fly this thing. The only thing is that my inbox in overflooding with mails, can't keep up. That is just a little too much, maybe dial it down a bit?

Review.Titre: Great app builder
Review.Contenu: Signed up a few weeks ago, and have been busy using the app builder to create my mobile app. It has some great features, and the app UI that is generated looks great / slick.I chose this platform because, while I have technical skills in app development, I wanted to focus on creating the content and running my business - not getting bogged down in technical detail.PROs: - Easy to use app builder - Great features - Super helpful and interesting start-up tips and videosCONs:- Support is a little slow- The builder needs a few additional features to allow for extra flexibility, e.g. more control over fonts and font colours per page

Review.Titre: Creating greater work to inspire a much more engaged future.
Review.Contenu: I am grateful for the support that I receive from the Passion.io team.My app is about inspiring people to create their success by shooting for the sky, and landing on a star, far greater than the one that you was shooting for.I explained to the support person that I need  my app  updated from Android 12, 31 to Android 13, 33 before November 1st 2023 so that I may continue to update it. I also told him that my play billing library must be moved up from version 4 to version 5.The young man seemed to be in a hurry, therefore we didn't  complete the 45 minute talk, but he explained to me that anything that needs to be updated on the will take place when Passion.io upload or connect Google play console to their site.I then thanked him and told him that I appreciate his hp in this matter.Thank you Mr.Johnny Ishmel Henry

Review.Titre: It's possible to build your app without technical background
Review.Contenu: The technical side of building my own app has been easier than I thought. I didn't have a computer background before, but I still mostly managed on my own. It is easy to ask for help and I have experienced getting fast and good help from Passion.I'm looking forward to being able to change the language everywhere in the entire app so that my app can be completely Norwegian.Can't wait to get my meditations out to the people through a separate app.

Review.Titre: Hopeful that the platform will improve
Review.Contenu: I've launched my app and am hopeful things will start to become more seamless. I think it's a great platform for the price! The live support when available is very helpful. Some parts of the process I have found to be delayed - it took about 4 weeks to get my app published with all the back and forth. But now I'm up and running and starting to promote! The team is constantly coming up with new updates which is great, because sometimes functionality has felt limited.

Review.Titre: worked to resolve issues
Review.Contenu: While the concept is good and something I was really excited about it wasn't right for my business right now. The support team is helpful with resolving issues, although it took a bit longer than I would have liked when canceling my account. They were persistent with helping me address my concerns and I do appreciate that.

Review.Titre: I really love the work that passion
Review.Contenu: I really love the work that passion. has helped me do. They offer an abundance of training and additional support as part of your membership with them and all issues I have encountered were handled swiftly. There are probably some features I could think of wanting that escape me at the moment but they are constantly seeking feedback which is the most important thing when building a platform such as this. Keep killin it

Review.Titre: Time is valuable!
Review.Contenu: I am still in the process of getting my new app out there so I can't speak to the user platform just yet but I have inquired on many occasions for help and the chat box agent has always answered within minutes. If you own a business you know how valuable it is to get your questions answered immediately and solve the problem while your mind is focused on it. That is a serious bonus from other platforms that use emails to communicate ineffectively. Well done Passion!

Review.Titre: You give us the opportunity to create a…
Review.Contenu: You give us the opportunity to create a business as new entrepreneurs. Incredible! Through my research, I found branding and adv strategies I like to use, ( therefore the 4 and not 5 stars) still your value is miraculous. You are a pioneer in helping people who would not consider themselves entrepreneurs ( which is a term not quite old) become one. Much appreciation for all your work and the fascinating idea!!! A lot of people need to know about Passion.io.

Review.Titre: Passion.io made complicated things easy
Review.Contenu: Passion.io made complicated things possible! If you have a true passion towards your profession and you see how people can benefit from it using a mobile app - passion.io is a place to go! All the guidelines, templates, necessary explanations on how to build your own world are all there! Without passion.io I would not be able to understand all the tech parts of building an app.The only thing is that it takes some time to resolve issues, but that is also perfectly normal.

Review.Titre: Passion is amazing and they genuinely…
Review.Contenu: Passion is amazing and they genuinely care about us and want us to succeed.  Their training is spectacular.The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is that I feel they oversold the "Push Notifications" feature, which is why I bought it.  They have very limited push notifications currently that don't fit my needs and what I thought I was buying.  They are working on it, but I've been waiting 15 months and there is still no definitive timeline for when this feature will be available to all users.

Review.Titre: Problem solving in 20 minutes
Review.Contenu: It was great getting help from Logan on the finishing touches on my Application Form.  Even though he hasn't worked on the TypeForm platform for awhile, he figured things out pretty quickly.  I'm giving it 4 stars because you session was only 20 minutes.  It's hard to figure things out and solving the problem in 20 minutes.  I had to book another session.

Review.Titre: A place where honesty is appreciated
Review.Contenu: A place where honesty is appreciated. That’s the first thing in the email that caught up my mind… Now that’s more than excellent thing out there, in the business world. Your dignity approach and kind care for your customers is for admiration. However, I didn’t felt welcomed in the FB PF Community so I didn’t have any benefits from that side, but Passion team itself is a great team and I can just wish you the best. Maybe I'll make to bring my app to life, maybe not, but otherwise I do not regret for spending money cause it pushed me to think beyond and to go out of my comfort zone.

Review.Titre: Great experience!
Review.Contenu: Passion is a great company and Dan is really passionate about what he does, all Passion Fighters are super friendly and they want everyone to sucseed 😊 Trainings are very helpful and they make me go foreward. I launched my WebApp and I am pretty satisfied with everything. They got 4 stars from me because I am waiting for 5 days to resolve the technical issue that me and my users have with PassionApp on Android Phones. Besides that, everything is great 🤗

Review.Titre: Support options and clear layout
Review.Contenu: I love the simply layout. Much less overwhelming than before, I can see the team’s commitment to serving us better every day. Much more communication lines seem to be in place. I feel supported more now than when I first started a year ago I was overwhelmed in general but now in myself I can see more clarity around how to get support and there seems to be extra help 1:1. I really appreciate being about to book a support call within the week. I cannot upload the images I got taken for my course because I didn’t understand image sizes and pixels but I’m getting there and glad to have someone to go to for 1:1 help after my initial group call because at the time that was overwhelming mostly because I wasn’t ready but was great to be able to do the group call again.

Review.Titre: The app has provided me with clients…
Review.Contenu: The app has provided me with clients that I would not have reached otherwise. Building the app without passion would have been impossible for me. The support staff at passion is really fast, knowledgeable and nice to deal with.

Review.Titre: log in confusions.
Review.Contenu: Passion have changed my life, i'm forever grateful.  Very helpful support.  One thing i struggle with is:  the sign in and log in options confuse my elderly clients and i spend a lot of time holding their hand through the not very intuitive logging in process.  so the log in button is hiding at the bottom of the profile page when it could be more up front.  One other bug bear is that i cannot easily tell who has signed up for what, at a glance, in the back office, nor delete or get rid of inactive subscribers, nor identify subscribers if they did not put ther name next to their email.  Trying to identify clients just by email is sometimes impossible.  So after two years of subscribers coming and going, my back office is a bit of a mess.  But frankly, honestly, i'm very grateful to Passion because they made a promise, I did the work and together we got  results.  and it was fun.

Review.Titre: the trainings are an incredible bonus
Review.Contenu: Dan is so great! and the community is pretty positive. i absolutely love and appreciate the trainings that are included, they have helped me orient to this world so much, as a complete newbie to online selling and marketing. in terms of the app itself, i am a bit frustrated with the reliance on typeform as the only integrated and supported form builder.

Review.Titre: Support 1:1 meeting online with Ulandi
Review.Contenu: I was really worried that I have paid so much for the app and training, and going to incur monthly costs, without having launched my app as yet. I was not clear about a lot of things about the pages and navigating and presenting them well enough and what I should be doing...Ulandi was really great and logged in to my app and showed me what I could modify and update to start with and urged me to go on the Expert challenge to understand the process and follow it. Thank you so much Ulandi and Dan!

Review.Titre: I was super frustrated at first...
Review.Contenu: I was super frustrated at first, but I am not a coaching program and I was trying to fit an oval peg in a round hole. I wish there were some more features, like an in-app browser and the ability to turn off the mandatory login. I will say that they are very responsive when it comes to customer service. Most of the time I can live chat with someone and when there is a problem, they do everything they can to make the customer happy.

Review.Titre: Passion is great
Review.Contenu: Passion is great. They take you thru the baby steps of how to launch and the support and feedback is always there.

Review.Titre: So far the Passion has been an easy…
Review.Contenu: So far the Passion has been an easy plug and play app builder. Very good for straight forward courses and functionality. Have had very awesome support. Super responsive and helpful. They will walk you through every step of the process!

Review.Titre: Really amazing to be able to afford to…
Review.Contenu: Really amazing to be able to afford to build my own app and to be in the hands of a caring company that will nurture your business with you.

Review.Titre: PassionApp has helped me to grow my…
Review.Contenu: PassionApp has helped me to grow my business to a new level. I've received help along the process and I'm really greatful for the work Passion is doing for my app. There are still some issues in the app but I trust that PassionApp is doing their best to make the App better and better.

Review.Titre: Very Much Worth It!
Review.Contenu: The company exceeded my expectations in the areas of providing support for marketing and promotion of my app. Also, the level of support with accessing help on technical or design questions is also great. In terms of app development, it's a great tool; however, some of the templates are not intuitive. It took me longer than expected to actually design the app itself.

Review.Titre: Fantastic for Some Businesses, Just Not Mine
Review.Contenu: The program is well created walking you every step of the way if you are a gym or have written an ebook etc. I own a children’s art studio and really wanted to have an app for online lessons. I had to do a lot of extra figuring on how to make it work for what I needed. Eventually I got tired and I don’t have the money to renew and keep going. Too bad! They do have a program where they will put it together for you but it was way over my $5000 budget for this project.

Review.Titre: As an app builder i think it's a great…
Review.Contenu: As an app builder i think it's a great tool and staff are very supportive. Where we are as a business it lacked a little bit of customisation and flexibility to add components specific to our business, but I have no regrets trying it out.

Review.Titre: Title:  Maintaining your Balance in an Unbalanced World.
Review.Contenu: I think that  Passion.io is good company because it allows people to create apps, reach and inspire people globally.   Customer service is timely and informative but could use more methods of contact and response.  The staff seem to be friendly and cordial with a purpose to help people be a success in their endeavors. I  signed up with Passion.io approximately 5 months ago.  I am on the 6 weeks challenge course and I enjoy working on the app. I have hope for the world due to the fact we're all connected as one humanity, one spirit and one universe.My app deals with Thought Leadership with Mastermind perspectives that inspire within each of us, God's greatest gift, expression. Although,  I haven't been with Passion.io very long but I feel genuinely good about the fact that I can create an app that can reach and inspire millions.  I have been trying to get to the podium for many years to express my God given talents to the people. Passion.io gives me that opportunity to connect with our greater community to help others aspire to their success.Many times when members from customer service try contacting me, i'm busy or out of place, it isn't their fault that they can't reach me but more of mine..Let's help each other to maintain balance in an Unbalanced World.  Thank you for allowing me to share with you the review platform, I would have given you 5 stars but I thought about it and decided to leave a little room for growth, lol.I hope giving you a 4 star rating and one to grow on will be sufficient, lol.

Review.Titre: Passion.io :: An Effective App Building Solution
Review.Contenu: The step by step instruction, templates and tutorials provide effective solutions for curating and building my app. I'm a couple of months into the journey and I know it will be worth it.

Review.Titre: I haven't built the app yet but going through training
Review.Contenu: I haven't built the app yet or completed my onboard call. So far the customer service has been great and the trainings are really easy and user-friendly. I don't doubt it'll be the avenue I'll go down. Everything is a leaning process with a learning curve. I'm sure this will be a 5 star in the future for me.

Review.Titre: The support team is great!
Review.Contenu: Greater App was just approved for both apple app and google play stores. I was so pleased to know there are smart and compassionate team members to help me every step of the way. They were always there, just an email away or available to meet me for a quick zoom meeting. I am so excited to go to the next phase of sharing my coaching app with my audience and the world. Thank you so!

Review.Titre: I appreciated Dans mannerisms and expertise
Review.Contenu: I appreciated Dans mannerisms and the energy that he bought to each presentation. The tips that he shared were also very helpful as they challenged you to put yourself out there.

Review.Titre: The support passion gives is so…
Review.Contenu: The support passion gives is so helpful. They’re on hand when you need and communicate really well as you build. I’ve always wanted an app but do not code and am not tech savvy. With Passion they make it easy and also create a way to learn with out feeling overwhelmed. Although it’s a process, it’s one that you’re not alone in.

Review.Titre: I'm inexperience and new to this!
Review.Contenu: So, I am new to this platform and I can honestly say that I have had a great experience thus far. I'm in the process of learning and designing and customer service has been quite helpful in my journey. Keep up the good work.

Review.Titre: Just trust and follow the process
Review.Contenu: Passion.Io has a very solid proces that you can follow. Both in Building content, Get you app approved, and the sales proces. It really worked for me.Still need to see the business case to succed for me personally. Thats why it is "only" 4 stars at this moment.

Review.Titre: Mostly like it
Review.Contenu: For the most part. I truly enjoy the content given from this app. I appreciate at the knowledge and sincere guidelines to follow. You have to actually do the work though to see the results. No half stepping. The only thing I’ll complain about is cost, but you get what you pay for, so it’s worth it.

Review.Titre: Enjoy the flexibility of membership
Review.Contenu: It's been a slow start for me but I received great support from everyone I have interacted with.  I am moving and was able to put my membership on hold for 29. dollars a month which was very helpful.  No hassle.

Review.Titre: Passion.io is an amazing company
Review.Contenu: Passion.io is an amazing company. Lots of information and they want to see you succeed. I highly recommend passion.io to people looking to build an app.

Review.Titre: Having a bit of a rough start building…
Review.Contenu: Having a bit of a rough start building the app due to back end technical difficulties but the technical support was informative and able to help me navigate the issues at hand. I look forward to creating!

Review.Titre: I am very happy with this platform
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with this platform, has almost everything I was looking for and great support when ever needed⭐️

Review.Titre: So far my experience has been great
Review.Contenu: So far my experience has been great. The lessons are to the point and the program really gets you to think outside the box and create. I look forward to the app launch!

Review.Titre: Great company
Review.Contenu: Great company, 4 stars because I've had some slight issues but they do their best to sort them out. I've never made an app before and now I have one in the app store. Google have been a nightmare

Review.Titre: The team are great
Review.Contenu: The team are great. You can get easy access to support. They may not always align with my goals all of the time but they are right about 70% of the time. Would recommend, and have already.

Review.Titre: What attracted me to Passion.io was Dan's charisma on the one hand, and his down-to-earth approach on the other.
Review.Contenu: I have just started the 30 days, so I am have not yet experienced success, but Dan is holding my hand all the way, and I am confident that in a month or two from now, I will have a solid business plan and a functioning app that will attract my first customers.

Review.Titre: So far
Review.Contenu: So far, so good. Passion has a personal investment to ensure you succeed in your endeavours and pull out the stops (positive reinforcement methods), to ensure you do.

Review.Titre: Great product and training
Review.Contenu: Great product and training. So happy I took the leap, 2 weeks in I can see already that it will add much value to my clients and new revenue streams as well

Review.Titre: Passion Dan and his team have made…
Review.Contenu: Passion Dan and his team have made themselves accessible with hands on support and well designed onboarding process.

Review.Titre: Passion.io is user friendly
Review.Contenu: Passion.io is a good product and easy to learn. The support team is friendly and helpful. However, it would be nice to have more members available to help troubleshoot. I also appreciate that passion is always updating their features and making the product more user-friendly.

Review.Titre: Passion gave me a chance to open up and…
Review.Contenu: Passion gave me a chance to open up and insist on my own development

Review.Titre: If they work as hard to help you build…
Review.Contenu: If they work as hard to help you build your app, as they do to sell you theirs. It will have a good foundation.

Review.Titre: Easiest way out there to launch your…
Review.Contenu: Easiest way out there to launch your own training app without specific development knowledge

Review.Titre: User support has been great
Review.Contenu: User support has been great. The Passion team are responsive and are very happy to support.

Review.Titre: Innovative
Review.Contenu: Easy accessable, innovative and a great plattform.

Review.Titre: Easy
Review.Contenu: Fast, easy way to create an App. It's not perfect but it works and there's a support team to help.

Review.Titre: There are a few features I wish were a…
Review.Contenu: There are a few features I wish were a little more user-friendly. However, using the “help” button at the bottom usually answers all of my questions on how to find features that aren’t obvious. I also followed experts, unleashed to a T, and made my investment back and then some within the first 30 days.

Review.Titre: Building my own App became a 'must'
Review.Contenu: My experience in building my app with Passion.io is extremely amazing! The support team are always very helpful and right on time. I definietly recommend passion.io to others to grow their services or products they want to expand digitally. Thank you Dan and support team for your support!

Review.Titre: Passion is Responsive to Customer Needs
Review.Contenu: Passion has been responsive to my individual circumstances. Support is available when needed - just learning how to access and utilise it in the most efficient manner. Training is helpful! Thanks Passion!

Review.Titre: Great support and feature set
Review.Contenu: So far I've enjoyed my experience with Passion. Their support is very responsive and thorough, and from my research, they're providing a very comprehensive feature set with their app platform product, with additional features being added daily. What's keeping this from being 5 stars is a few features I'm still wanting to see added (in particular, more options for push notifications), and I haven't completed the process of building the app and launching, so I can't give a complete review yet.

Review.Titre: Excellent value
Review.Contenu: This is a great app choice for starting out with good support.  It doesn't have every feature I would wish for AND it doesn't have a crazy price tag either.  It is excellent value for money and after talking about going next level with my business, this software has made it possible.

Review.Titre: Be aware that many of the features they…
Review.Contenu: Be aware that many of the features they advertise are only available with subscribing to other services and/or if you actually create an app for the Apple Store and Google.  Most people will be doing that but there are severe limitations and big expenses in putting your app through Apple and Google as opposed to offering it yourself.  Support is pretty good most of the time.  This is a relatively knew app, so it is still growing.  They charge a price (in addition to Stripe's fees) for subscriptions through your app unless you are at the highest (Ultimate Plus) level. Unlimited video upload for Ultimate and higher is excellent.

Review.Titre: A Company With Heart
Review.Contenu: I think this is a company with heart - however, I'm not sure enough attention is given to those disheartened about not ringing the bell. To me, seeing people ringing the bell is great for them and yes it makes you realise that the process works, but it isn't a tactic that always makes the non-bell ringers feel better. It's an overwhelming process and it does need a lot of attention it also brings up a lot from within. So on that note, I am currently considering leaving Passion not as a victim but with a realisation that maybe this isn't right for me right now - despite being someone who has a lot to offer, it just might not be the right time.

Review.Titre: Makes it easy to create and grow your own mobile app
Review.Contenu: The Passion.io platform is a great concept and wave of the future. It's a "no-code" platform to make creating apps easy, accessible and affordable for everyone. As easy as blogging, for the most part, in creating the content. Getting the app to launch through APIs and technical hoops, adding more intuitive usability, and even advanced features, is where I and many others, have been prodding them to catch up on.

Review.Titre: In less than 3 weeks I have my app…
Review.Contenu: In less than 3 weeks I have my app almost ready to launch and I have no idea about apps. I think the service is great, I just wish I could change more things within the app as in text size, colours, etc. In a way it´s like a very rigid template but there is always someone really nice ready to tell you how to fix things. I give it today 4 stars but will review my opinion once I launch the App.

Review.Titre: Wow! I built an App
Review.Contenu: Wow! If someone told me I would be building my own app and a successful one to boot, just a year ago I would have laughed them out of the room! Today, with the help and trusting the process of Passion.io I have an app!

Review.Titre: Happy customer
Review.Contenu: This process has been a lot of fun for me! It was pretty simple to create what I needed to and if I didn't know something I could usually find the answer really quickly. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 was the speed in which I got help through support. There is a lot of info and help online, but getting help directly from support took longer than I liked. I'm not super impatient, but when you are trying to launch days can feel like weeks. Would be nice to have a live chat feature to get questions answered.

Review.Titre: A learning experience
Review.Contenu: I have updated my review as the owner personally reached out to me. I did get a refund. I understand as a business grows, there are issues. For me, it was a learning experience, and truly not for me. I have tons of content, however, my audience prefers different a different platforms. Please do your research and decide why you need an app. Is it for you or for your community? There are technical things with API etc the tech team will help, especially with Google & Apple (for me the biggest hurdle and test of patience)

Review.Titre: It’s not just an App, it’s a platform with a supportive community and educational learning to advance you into feeling confident as a creator
Review.Contenu: I’m in the Process of creating my coaching App, i’m half way there, creating a course requires more than buying the subscription it’s a commitment to being a course creator with all the technical stuff audio, videos, scripts, branding, lives and community involved, your the creator of your product! so far I have found the process of building my course content onto the App easier than I perceived it would be, there is so much support from other passion fighters in the community and the team, it’s a good platform where I can launch my course and feel confident to do coaching with groups, it will challenge you because your in charge of marketing your product on the App to get your work out there, your doing something you never thought you could it’s very rewarding to see yourself move through your milestones this App allows me to relax more because the App has a lot of the inbuilt features and resources I need to create the best service for myself and my community it also allows me to pace myself and be flexible with my time so I’m not overwhelmed, I’m in charge of how many clients, clocking on time the amount of time I work with clients. There is so much freedom, there is so much support the EUC challenge allows you to launch your course faster with all the relevant educational templates to do it and support from others in the community to help you through it and other important trainings with live q&a sessions to advance your learning to feel confident to do the more practical stuff, it’s not just an App it’s a supportive community who all have the end goal in mind to live a life they love through our passions and missions being in service. Jodie

Review.Titre: So far this process of building an APP…
Review.Contenu: So far this process of building an APP at Passion.io is fairly simple, a small learning curve and some of the pieces take a moment to figure out via trail and error. I find the staff very helpful as well, even when I am frustrated from my own learning curve. It is a great place to activate!

Review.Titre: I created my app in just 30 days with…
Review.Contenu: I created my app in just 30 days with Passion! It works great, no glitches and its been a terrific way to overdeliver to my clients. They give you all the tools to design the app you want and niche down to your dream customers. The software is user friendly and they support you quickly with any speed bumps you may have. Thank you Passion

Review.Titre: Satisfied
Review.Contenu: Satisfied. But I had to cancel and haven't recieved any confirmation about canceling yet.

Review.Titre: Brilliant!!
Review.Contenu: The course is really easy to follow and is beautifully structured. As for the construction of the actual app, there is not much flexibility as it saves the changes without being able to go back (and if you just wanted to give it a try but are not happy you have to do it all over again). But overall it is a brilliant Product.

Review.Titre: Passion review
Review.Contenu: The staff are very helpful and are always in hand for advice, I’m still in the process of writing my app so have a little way to go before I see how it’s going to look. The only thing I would say is that it would be good to be able to see exactly how my app will look to prospective clients. Other than that all good so far.

Review.Titre: This platform for creating APPs is…
Review.Contenu: This platform for creating APPs is brilliant - easy to follow and thorough in its training too. I've created not one but two and can see easily how well this impacts positively on my coaching offers to clients.

Review.Titre: The Passion IO platform is excellent
Review.Contenu: The Passion IO platform is excellent. I have worked through the Expert unleashed process and will build my app soon with confidence. I learnt a lot about marketing my product. This process takes time, and it is good because you have the option to do it when it suits you.

Review.Titre: It has been great so far
Review.Contenu: It has been great so far. I am just getting started, so I feel like so far I have been rather impressed, and we'll see the results later on. It may be a little overwhelming in terms of how much info you receive, but I think it is to expect considering everything this thing seems to do for your business!

Review.Titre: I’m new to passion.io it looks…pretty good just a bit overwhelming.
Review.Contenu: I’m new to passion.io it looks wonderful but I think for so many of us starting out it’s a bit overwhelming. I can see how much thought and effort has been placed into showing customers how to use the app.I’m just wondering if you could offer an initial done for you tech support offer to help clients speed up the first stage product or service. That would help starters like me with time restraints ( working a day job ) to get the app up and running more quickly. Just a thought.

Review.Titre: I talked to my bank people they removed…
Review.Contenu: I talked to my bank people they removed the 2nd pending transaction from you, I thought I was charge twice.sorry about that. Thank you I would like to really start my app. I purchased 3 things I believed I saw the two when I logged in online last time. I’m wondering for the third one. Anyways I’ll just log in again and check. Thank you

Review.Titre: Highly motivated company
Review.Contenu: Highly motivated company. Good products and communication. As growing up company, still strugling with some technical issues, but I can trust them on the basis of previous experiens.

Review.Titre: I'm new to the program but so far…
Review.Contenu: I'm new to the program but so far impressed with how responsive support teams are with your trouble tickets. Dan genuinely seems to care about the success of clients and runs the company accordingly ~ transparency, responsiveness, integrity so far seems high. I'm happy with the program and excited what I can create with this platform/courses.

Review.Titre: I’m not a “techie”  person so I admit
Review.Contenu: I’m not a “techie”  person so I admit, I’d like someone to hold my hand through it.  It’s a bit confusing as I will run into a wall here or there about how to do something but the process is mostly an overall drag and drop way to do things. You just have to dig for the answers and find the motivation to keep building. Passion team is always quick to answer questions when i run into tech walls. They are also quite positive and you can’t help but feel like “I can do this” after watching Dan encourage his audience. I will know more about this app as I go along.

Review.Titre: I was struggling with different issues…
Review.Contenu: I was struggling with different issues regarding the payment scheme. and setting up my web app information and texte for my founding members launch launch. Georginia was very helpful and found solutions for my questions. I evan called twice at times that suited me. Passion Great feedback at this Expert unleashed stage  Carey

Review.Titre: Watched the 90 minute webinar
Review.Contenu: Ive watched the 90 minute webinar and definitely want to create an app but not sure what to do it in and who i would sell it to? Or if anyone would buy from me ! A lot of what i have read seems to be based around fitness / coaching. If i was to sign up do you have to pay for the fee up front or can you spread the payment over a few months .Good luck to those who have joined, it does seem very exciting!

Review.Titre: Powerful and it keeps getting better!
Review.Contenu: I created my training using the Passion.io platform several months ago.  Passion keeping improving and adding new functionality.  My biggest challenge is getting  up-to-speed with the changes.  I get lots of complements on my App and I love its cutting edge!This does mean that you need to stay on top of things.  The help center has useful articles on topics and, when I am stuck, I can always send a message for help.  I plan to create other training products for my audience.  I highly recommend Passion.io

Review.Titre: Dan's vision for helping coaches and other entrepreneurs is what sold me.
Review.Contenu: I never thought having my own app would be as easy as drag and drop. I am still in the process of getting everything together, but I feel supported with Dan and the team. Dan's vision for helping coaches and other entrepreneurs is what sold me. I'll get behind anyone with the same passion that Dan brings to the table. He's truly making a difference in the world, and I'm glad to be part of it!

Review.Titre: Really simple to use & great support

Review.Titre: I've worked with other apps for…
Review.Contenu: I've worked with other apps for health/performance programming for about the last 4 years or so. I thought there needed to be more of an education piece. The great thing about the 'challenges' they offer is that they are an example of what your clients/students will be going through when they use your app....but relating to what YOU are trying to create! As the app is geared toward non-techies, this baby step/explain it like I'm five' approach is IMMENSELY valuable. This was of exponentially greater value than I've had with other apps where you just ask questions where needed. They truly do have a lot of thought put into the user experience rather than just 'selling' something and this shows and relieves A LOT of trepidation toward using their product. I never recommend as I don't know your situation. But, I don't really see downsides anywhere.
